data.message:
The other morning, on my way to get on 520 going east... I spotted a conversation happening on the median between the heavy morning commute. The conversation was between a young man with a sign and a business woman with a snazzy leather briefcase which they were talking about and laughing,smiling, connecting I thought: " Because of Rex..." 
There was no crosswalk. She deliberately went over to talk with him.💕😘

replies.message: That's so great!!  Thank you for sharing!
